title: Jesy Nelson looks happier than ever in adorable loved-up snap with Chris Hughes

Jesy Nelson looks happier than ever in this adorable picture.

The Little Mix beauty has been through a lot and recently opened up to the world about trying to take her own life after being targeted by vicious trolls.

So it's about time that girl had something to smile about.

And thanks to boyfriend Chris Hughes , she can't wipe her grin off her face.

The couple look besotted with each other in their latest loved-up snap.

Jesy, 28, grabs hold of her man's face as she leans in for a kiss.

The singer bursts out laughing as she shares a joke with Chris, 26, who looks blissfully happy to have her near.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Falling into fits of giggles, the duo look as sweet as can be.

Sharing it on Instagram , former Love Island star Chris wrote: "Best form of therapy is laughter"

"U guys giving me all the feels," one fan commented.

While another said: "You 2 are so cute"

And another gave them a couple nickname, saying: "Chesy for life"

Jesy is on tour with her X Factor-winning girlband at the minute, and Chris has been spending plenty of time with her on the road.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

He took a night off earlier this week to head to the Mirror's Pride Of Britain awards, where he told people asking Jesy to be his girlfriend was the proudest moment of his life.

He also spoke about how overwhelmed Jesy had been following the response to her heartbreaking BBC documentary Odd One Out.

He told Mirror Online: "She found it overwhelming.

"Bless her she doesn't give herself enough credit, I said this is gonna help so many people.

"It's been amazing, it's helped thousands already she should be really proud of herself."

And while she has struggled, Chris said his girlfriend is "in a good place" right now.

He continued: "We support each other. It's awful when you see someone upset but she's got stronger as the years have gone on.

"She's in a good place right now."
